text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus oregonensis is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 1.5 to 2.5 centimetres (0.6 to 1.0 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus oregonensis has been found growing on conifer logs in Oregon, in November.
